text: Spot on, SupraDarky - good call.  Though it does seem the mood of this one is a bit lower, it's just as mysterious.  This is almost like a mix between Deus Ex (which wasn't out yet, it's actually a PC game) and DKC3, with the sweeping "granulized" (I don't know how else to refer to it) synth best heard in the 2:10 transition.
